body_html: Unfortunately, Windows support is highly experimental. Only cmake windows builds are unit tested. As is said on the web page. So what this means is that since you didn't get a response on StackOverflow and people have told you to make sure cudnn is properly getting detected. Probably nobody else has tried this yet, so you are on a trailblazing path.

body: Unfortunately, Windows support is highly experimental. Only cmake windows builds are unit tested. As is said on the web page. So what this means is that since you didn't get a response on StackOverflow and people have told you to make sure cudnn is properly getting detected. Probably nobody else has tried this yet, so you are on a trailblazing path.
